SELECT a.id, a.address, a.remark, CONVERT(a.create_time, CHAR) createTime, c.user_name userName, a.service_id serviceId, b.order_num orderNum, d.department_name departmentName FROM crm_service_register a LEFT JOIN sys_eve_user_staff c ON a.register_id = c.user_id LEFT JOIN company_department d ON c.department_id = d.id, crm_service b WHERE a.service_id = b.id
AND c.user_name LIKE '%${userName}%'
